title: Bug 104630: Column icons don't show up in connecting Derby database
SR: The Steps to Reproduce: 1. Create a new project. 2. Create a new report. 3. In the Data Explorer view, create a new data source to connect to a Derby database using the following details: Driver Class: com.ibm.db2.jcc.DB2Driver Database URL: jdbc:db2://spmdb:1527/gui User Name: root Password: root 4. After setting up the data source, create a dataset. 5. In the Edit Dataset window, select the Query option. 6.
